name: src/authorization.js
Authorization
description: accessor class for authorization over a {@link BouncerToken}

name: set
description: set and save a value against the bouncer token

unknown.tagValue: {Promise<Authorization} - return the authorization once data has been saved

params.name: callback
params.description: a callback to call after data is saved

return.description: return the authorization once data has been saved

name: get
description: get a value associated with a key

params.name: key
params.description: the key that the value is saved against

name: delete
description: delete a key in a bouncer token

unknown.tagValue: {Promise<Authorization} - return the authorization once data has been deleted

params.name: callback
params.description: a callback to call after data is deleted

return.description: return the authorization once data has been deleted

name: src/pipeline.js
ConnectorPipeline
description: Pipeline object for interaction with connectors

name: loadConnector
description: load the connector identified by the key

params.name: key
params.description: the unique key identifer for the connector

name: src/proxy.js
ConnectorProxy
description: a proxy class to the underlying connector

name: constructor
description: setup the connector proxy described by the {@link ConnectorSetting} object

params.name: connectorSetting
params.description: the settings for the underlying connector

unknown.tagValue: {Promise<ConnectorProxy>} - this proxy object to allow chaining

return.description: this proxy object to allow chaining

params.name: token
params.description: either the authorization object or a bouncer token key
